thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I had ordered the wrong size tires off of their website, and Tim was very helpful in aiding me to find another set of tires in the store that were comparable to the ones I had ordered. Not only that, but there were quite a bit cheaper then the tires I had picked out online. The service was fast and smooth, and you could tell that they were honest. Very pleased!
